item.title: Achieving Infinite WPM in MonkeyType using Python
item.description: So I have this one friend who constantly boasts about his sub-200 WPM typing speed. I tried competing with him but couldn’t manage it above 100 WPM. I decided it was not worth the effort since I could beat him with the help of Python! :) We’ll be using the awesome selenium library for this task. Prerequisites Just intermediate-level knowledge of Python. That’s all. I’ll be explaining selenium along the way.
